name: weather-agent
description: Intelligent weather notification system with AI agent orchestration, automated scheduling via BullMQ, and Redis-backed job queues.

scripts.dev:rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d --remove-orphans
scripts.prod:rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yaml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yaml up -d --remove-orphans
